html: Wherefore—The general accusation delivered in the last words he now proves by particular instances. When—When I, first by my prophets, came to call them to repentance. No man—That complied with my call. To answer—To come at my call. Is my hand—What is the reason of this contempt? Is it because you think I am either unwilling or unable to save you? A wilderness—As dry and fit for travelling as a wilderness.
